fix.explanation: Users expect product images to be clickable and lead to more information. By making the entire product grid item clickable and opening the product modal, we address this expectation and reduce user frustration by removing the dead clicks. Adding the `cursor: pointer` style to the image provides visual feedback, reinforcing the interaction.
